x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.potential_impact:
ServiceNow University - A centralized platform helps rural youth access digital courses, career resources, and certification programs from anywhere. 

App Engine Studio - To design an intuitive and accessible user interface for learners, mentors, and administrators.

Flow Designer - To automate workflows like user registration, course enrolment, progress updates, and feedback collection. 

UI Policies - To ensure dynamic form behaviour — for example, displaying (show/hide) mentor fields only when the user type is “Student".
x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.problem_statement: Youth in remote villages face limited access to quality education, digital resources, and career guidance. Poor connectivity and lack of mentorship prevent them from upskilling or exploring career opportunities, widening the gap between rural and urban employment prospects.
